  • Constructor Details

    • WaterRenderer

      public WaterRenderer​(Loader loader, WaterShader shader, org.lwjglx.util.vector.Matrix4f projectionMatrix, WaterFrameBuffers fbos)
      Constructor for the water Renderer.
      Parameters:
      loader - Loader, loader that sets up the VAO.
      shader - WaterShader, this is the shader for the water.
      projectionMatrix - Matrix4f, this is the projection matrix of the waterrenderer.
      fbos - WaterFrameBuffers, this are the water frame buffers of the water renderer.

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render​(java.util.List<WaterTile> water, Camera camera)
      Method that renders the waterTiles.
      Parameters:
      water - List, List of waterTiles that will be rendered.
      camera - Camera, camera that will be rendered and set as the viewMatrix by the prepareRender method.

    • prepareRender

      private void prepareRender​(Camera camera)
      Method that prepares the shaders for rendering.
      Parameters:
      camera - Camera, this camera gets loaded as the view Matrix.

      private void unbind()
